headline: Deckers Earnings Scorecard: Nearly Straight A’s Send Stock Soaring 15%
summary: Deckers Outdoor (NYSE: DECK) reported fiscal Q3 2026 results that crushed expectations, sending shares up 15% as investors rewarded the premium footwear maker’s ability to grow profitably despite tariff headwinds and a promotional retail environment. The company delivered diluted EPS of $3.33, beating consensus estimates of $2.77 by 20%, while revenue of $1.96 billion topped ... headline: Deckers Third-Quarter Sales Rise on Demand for Hoka
summary: Demand for Hoka has climbed in the U.S. and internationally, Chief Executive  Stefano Caroti  said during a call with analysts.  Hoka sales jumped 19% in the quarter, pushing overall revenue up 7.1%.  Hoka has also been resonating with a wider range of consumers, including those looking for lifestyle apparel rather than just performance wear, and has had a growing international presence.
